cause.description:
Forty percent of the people on our planet—more than 2.5 billion—now live in poverty, struggling to survive on less than $2 a day. Oxfam America is an international relief and development organization working to change that. Together with individuals and local groups in more than 120 countries, Oxfam saves lives, helps people overcome poverty, and fights for social justice.
1. Ending Global Hunger and Poverty
2. Responding to Global Emergencies
3. Helping Poor People Adapt to Climate Change
4. Responding to the Conflicts in Darfur and the Congo
5. Women's Rights
cause.mission: Oxfam America is an international relief and development organization that creates lasting solutions to poverty, hunger, and injustice.
cause.name: Oxfam America
